data.text: Ici nĩ thimo ingĩ cia Solomoni, iria ciacookanĩrĩirio na ikĩandĩkwo nĩ andũ a Hezekia ũrĩa warĩ mũthamaki wa Juda:
Kũhithĩrĩra ũndũ nĩ ũgooci wa Ngai;
O ta ũrĩa igũrũ kũraihĩte na igũrũ, nakuo thĩ gũkarika mũno-rĩ,
Theria betha ĩthire gĩko,
eheria andũ arĩa aaganu harĩ mũthamaki,
Ndũgetũũgĩrie harĩ mũthamaki,
kaba mũthamaki we mwene akwĩre, “Ambata, ũũke haha,”
ndũkahiũhe kũũtwara igooti-inĩ,
Ciirai na mũndũ wa itũũra rĩaku we mwene,
kana ũiguuo nĩ mũndũ ũngĩ agũconore,
Kiugo kĩarĩtio hĩndĩ ĩrĩa yagĩrĩire
Gĩcũhĩ gĩa gũtũ gĩa thahabu, kana ithaga rĩa thahabu ĩrĩa therie,
Ta ũhehu wa tharunji hĩndĩ ya magetha,
O ta ũrĩa matu na rũhuho matarĩ mbura ihaana,
Ũkirĩrĩria no ũguucĩrĩrie ũrĩa waathanaga etĩkĩre ũndũ,
Ũngĩona ũũkĩ-rĩ, rĩa o wa gũkũigana,
Nyiihia gũthiiaga kwa mũndũ wa itũũra,
Mũndũ ũrĩa ũheanaga ũira wa maheeni agookĩrĩra mũndũ wa itũũra,
Kwĩhoka mũndũ ũtarĩ mwĩhokeku hĩndĩ ya thĩĩna,
Ũrĩa ũinagĩra mũndũ ũrĩ na ngoro nditũ nyĩmbo,
Thũ yaku ĩngĩkorwo ĩhũtiĩ-rĩ, mĩhe irio ĩrĩe;
Weka ũguo-rĩ, nĩũkũmĩigĩrĩra makara ma mwaki mũtwe,
O ta ũrĩa rũhuho rwa gathigathini rũrehaga mbura,
Nĩ kaba gũtũũra nyũmba-igũrũ koine-inĩ,
O ta ũrĩa maaĩ mahehu manyootoraga mũndũ mũnyootu,
O ta gĩthima kĩiyũrĩte ndaka, kana itherũkĩro rĩa maaĩ riunjuge,
Ti wega kũrĩa ũũkĩ mũingĩ mũno,
Mũndũ ũtangĩhota gwatha ngoro yake
